service.name: Multi-Service Correlation
service.description: Correlate data across multiple Azure services for comprehensive analysis

correlationId.description: Correlation ID to link related events across services

sourceIp.description: Source IP address common across services

services.description: Azure services to include in correlation

security-incident-correlation.name: Security Incident Correlation
security-incident-correlation.description: Correlate security events across Azure Firewall, Application Gateway, and NSGs

traffic-flow-analysis.name: Traffic Flow Analysis
traffic-flow-analysis.description: Analyze traffic flow patterns across multiple network services

performance-correlation.name: Performance Impact Correlation
performance-correlation.description: Correlate performance metrics across load balancing and security services

compliance-audit.name: Compliance Audit Trail
compliance-audit.description: Generate audit trail across multiple services for compliance reporting

union_correlation.description: Union multiple service tables with time-based correlation
union_correlation.template: union {tables} | where TimeGenerated >= ago({timeRange}) | where {filters} | extend CorrelationWindow = bin(TimeGenerated, {timeWindow}) | summarize Events = count(), Services = make_set(Type), FirstEvent = min(TimeGenerated), LastEvent = max(TimeGenerated) by CorrelationWindow, {correlationFields} | order by CorrelationWindow desc

traffic_flow_correlation.description: Analyze traffic flow patterns with correlation
traffic_flow_correlation.template: union {tables} | where TimeGenerated >= ago({timeRange}) | where {filters} | extend FlowWindow = bin(TimeGenerated, {timeWindow}) | summarize InboundCount = countif(Direction == 'Inbound'), OutboundCount = countif(Direction == 'Outbound'), UniqueServices = dcount(Type) by FlowWindow, SourceIp, DestinationIp | order by FlowWindow desc

performance_correlation.template: union {tables} | where TimeGenerated >= ago({timeRange}) | where {filters} | extend PerfWindow = bin(TimeGenerated, {timeWindow}) | summarize AvgResponseTime = avg(ResponseTime), TotalRequests = sum(RequestCount), ErrorRate = avg(ErrorRate) by PerfWindow, Type | order by PerfWindow desc

audit_correlation.template: union {tables} | where TimeGenerated >= ago({timeRange}) | where {filters} | extend AuditWindow = bin(TimeGenerated, {timeWindow}) | project TimeGenerated, Type, Operation, Result, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, ResourceId | order by TimeGenerated desc

timeBasedCorrelation.description: Correlate events within specified time windows

ipBasedCorrelation.description: Correlate events by source/destination IP addresses

timelineView.name: Correlation Timeline
timelineView.description: Timeline view of correlated events across services

networkFlow.name: Network Flow Diagram
networkFlow.description: Visual representation of network traffic flow

heatmap.name: Service Activity Heatmap
heatmap.description: Heatmap showing activity levels across services and time
